channel.title: Latest from Android Central
channel.description: All the latest content from the Android Central team

item.title: Nothing is the only brand taking the counterfeit tech problem seriously
item.description: Counterfeit tech products are a major problem globally, and the knockoffs get better every year. One tech company is finally talking about the issue publicly.
item.author: bradypsnyder@gmail.com (Brady Snyder)
item.dc:creator: Brady Snyder
